justifications: In the UK, solar beat coal over a whole month of UK electricity generation for first time in May.
China is on course to generate fully a quarter of its electricity from wind power by 2030.
In India, solar has become the fastest-growing new energy source.
With 1 million now on the world's roads, EVs are on track for a 2°C global-warming scenario, the goal of the UN's Paris agreement on climate change.
Most notably this month, Volkswagen announced a plan to seek redemption from its emissions fraud crimes via a strategy centred on EVs, robo-taxis, and a ride sharing network.
French oil major Total entered the residential power market by acquiring Lampiris, Belgium's third-largest natural gas and renewable power vendor for the residential sector.

Total entered the residential power market by acquiring Lampiris, Belgium's third-largest natural gas and renewable power vendor for the residential sector. This on top of its earlier major investments in solar (Sunpower) and batteries (Saft).

Dong Energy, a renewable energy company, became the largest IPO anywhere in the world so far this year. Dong was once an oil and gas company: its name stands for Danish Oil and Gas. Now 75% of its capital is going into renewables.
